description.narrative: ZNAPD Ngwena River Farming project 2nd phase. WHAT: Project supports a farm in Lufwanyama area, Sambia by teaching the disabled and nondisabled personnel new cultivation methods and marketing.WHY: The project is continuation of the previous project which w as launched in 2008. In the previous project the banana farm was established and the first crop was harvested. However the climate change in Lufwanyama area has challenged the banana farming and there is a demand for new strains.HOW: Project benefits the d isabled and nondisabled people who are working at the farm. Modernization of the farming and the income from the farm however benefits the whole area of Lufwanyama.PARTNER ORGANISATION: The project is implemented by Zambia?s greatest disability organizatio n ZNAPD.
